p: In the Middle East, there was an outbreak in King Abulaziz Medical Center in Riyadh with 130 cases from June to August as well as multi-facility outbreaks in Riyadh and Madinah from September to November of 2015 [ 1, 26, 70]. In 2016, an outbreak in Buraidah of Saudi Arabia occurred in February and March [ 1, 26]. And recently, an outbreak in a Riyadh hospital with 24 cases due to superspreading occurred mid-2016 [ 71].
